CustomField.description: BODEV-1100: UserGem Past Account's Original Contract Start Date
CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK( UserGems__PastAccount__c ), ISBLANK( UserGems__PastAccount__r.Original_Contract_Start_Date__c ) ), NULL, UserGems__PastAccount__r.Original_Contract_Start_Date__c )
CustomField.label: UG - Past Acc. Original Cont. Start Date
